title: Infernal Diana skin code doesn't work
body:
Just got back from OPL, and being the first live game I've seen, it was an enjoyable experience, though the outcome was a little disappointing.

Tried to enter the code to redeem Infernal Diana and unfortunately it doesn't work. Tried to send a ticket in, but the site keeps redirecting. Not sure what to do to redeem the skin.

replies.body:
I've tried doing both of them, but it still says the code is not valid. 

Is this code region locked to Oceania servers only?

That's what I thought until I tried making the big 0 (zero), at the start of the code, a capital O. 
Have you tried that?
That totally worked, thanks for that man.
